virtual void AK::IAkMixerPluginContext::Mix1inNChannels ( AkReal32 *AK_RESTRICT  in_pInChannel,
AkAudioBuffer *  in_pMixBuffer,
AkReal32  in_fPrevGain,
AkReal32  in_fNextGain,
AK::SpeakerVolumes::VectorPtr  in_vPrevVolumes,
AK::SpeakerVolumes::VectorPtr  in_vNextVolumes 
) [pure virtual]

1 to N channels mix

Parameters:
in_pInChannel Input channel buffer.
in_pMixBuffer Multichannel buffer with which the input buffer is mixed.
in_fPrevGain Gain, corresponding to the beginning of the input channel.
in_fNextGain Gain, corresponding to the end of the input channel.
in_vPrevVolumes Output channel volume distribution corresponding to the beginning of the buffer (see AK::SpeakerVolumes::Vector services).
in_vNextVolumes Output channel volume distribution corresponding to the end of the buffer (see AK::SpeakerVolumes::Vector services).
